articles.title: Arizona Gov. Ducey stacks containers on border at term's end
articles.description: SAN RAFAEL VALLEY, Arizona (AP) — Work crews have steadily erected hundreds of double-stacked shipping containers topped by razor wire along Arizona’s remote eastern boundary with Mexico in a bold show of border enforcement by Republican Gov.
articles.content: A long row of double-stacked shipping contrainers provide a new wall between the United States and Mexico in the remote section area of San Rafael Valley, Ariz., Thursday, Dec. 8, 2022. Work crews are steadily erecting hundreds of double-stacked ship... [8005 chars]

articles.title: Live Updates: NASA’s Artemis I Moon Mission Returns to Earth
articles.description: The Orion spacecraft, which is to carry astronauts to and from the moon in coming years, will splash down in the Pacific Ocean Sunday after a test flight with no crew aboard.
articles.content:
And on the 26th day, the moon capsule returned to Earth.
During the early hours of Nov. 16, NASA launched a giant rocket toward the moon. The rocket reached orbit and sent a small capsule, this time with no astronauts on board, on its way to the moon... [2809 chars]

articles.title: Sanders calls Sinema ‘corporate Democrat’ who ‘sabotaged’ legislation
articles.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) slammed Sen. Kyrsten Sinema (I-Ariz.) on Sunday as a “corporate Democrat” who “sabotaged” party priorities following her announcement that she was becoming an Independent. During an appearance on CNN’s “State of the Union” with co-anchor Dana Bash, Sanders said Sinema didn’t have the guts to take on special interests while attacking…
articles.content:

articles.title: Galaxy S23 can record slightly smoother 8K videos
articles.description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 series will have improved camera performance, and according to reports, it can record smoother 8K videos. - SamMobile
articles.content: Apart from the 200MP camera sensor on the Galaxy S23 Ultra, Samsung might not bring any significant camera improvement on the hardware level. However, we can still expect improved image and video quality, thanks to a better chipset and improved softw... [1166 chars]

articles.title: NASA’s Artemis I Moon Mission Landing: How to Watch
articles.description: The Orion capsule, this time with no astronauts aboard, will splash down on Sunday afternoon after a 26-day journey that took it to the moon and back.
articles.content:
And on the 26th day, the moon capsule returned to Earth.

articles.title: Libyan Charged in 1988 Lockerbie Plane Bombing Is in FBI Custody
articles.description: Abu Agila Mohammad Mas’ud, a Libyan bomb expert, is accused of building the explosive device used in the 1988 bombing of Pan Am Flight 103.
articles.content: WASHINGTON — A Libyan intelligence operative charged in the 1988 bombing of an American jetliner over Lockerbie, Scotland, was arrested by the F.B.I. and being extradited to the United States to face prosecution for one of the deadliest terrorist att... [1100 chars]

articles.title: Japanese company's lander rockets toward moon with UAE rover
articles.description: CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) — A Tokyo company aimed for the moon with its own private lander Sunday, blasting off atop a SpaceX rocket with the United Arab Emirates’ first lunar rover and a toylike robot from Japan that’s designed to roll around up there in the gray dust.
articles.content: A SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket, with a payload including two lunar rovers from Japan and the United Arab Emirates, lifts off from Launch Complex 40 at the Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Cape Canaveral, Fla., Sunday, Dec. 11, 2022. (AP Photo/John Rao... [4849 chars]

articles.title: NASA's Artemis mission concludes with Orion splashdown
articles.description: The Artemis I mission — a historic uncrewed test flight around the moon meant to pave the way for future astronaut missions — is coming to an end as NASA's Orion spacecraft is making an ocean splashdown on Sunday.
articles.content:

articles.title: More Jersey blast survivors unlikely as response shifts to recovery operation
articles.description: Three people were confirmed killed and police say around a dozen others remain missing.
articles.content: LONDON, Dec 11 (Reuters) - Jersey emergency services said on Sunday its search and rescue operation after an explosion at an apartment building on the island was now a recovery mission, a possible indication that there were unlikely to be more surviv... [1717 chars]

articles.title: Morocco's historic World Cup achievement hailed worldwide
articles.description: As the first African and first Arab country to reach the World Cup semifinals, Morocco's soccer team now represents so much more than its own nation as its achievements have united a region and continent in celebration.
articles.content:
